title: Dear Shotcallers (Penitent Letter)

replies.body:
If you don't have post-lvl9 sweepers, at least go in prepared with some pinks. At 22mins into game no one on your team would have been full build so no excuses for not have a spare slot to buy a pink to secure a very important objective. Denying the enemy team vision is #1 priority. 
Like Eimer Troll said, you also want to make sure you had some sort of skirmish and have killed at least two of the enemy carries, or that they are pushing bot and all their teleports are on CD, anything really that will make their counter on the objective an unfair fight under those circumstances. 
An unfair fight (in your favour) is always the best kind of fight.

At 22minutes to do baron you really want to have aced their team or convincingly won a team fight that chunked them out so they had to recall but left your team relatively healthy. Also you need complete vision. 22minutes is so early to be attempting baron though. 
Your best bet would have been to set up vision and denied all their vision around the area. Possibly do the same around dragon depending on the timer
